name: Thermaltake MO-BLK002DT Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [INSTANT DPI CONTROL, Instant DPI control in 400/ 800/2000/4000 dpi for FPS or MMORPG game needs, RUBBER COATING, Rubber coating coverage to ensure strong hand grip in game control, ANTI-SLIP THUMB GRIP, Anti-slip thumb grip texture ensure precise movement control, LIGHTING INNOVATION, Unique light design on Tt logo to build up the battle engagement, WEIGHT IN, Let gamers adjust the mouse weight for perfect mouse control handling, 4TH BUTTON HOTKEY, Last page hotkey  for instant access to last page with no software needed, PHILIPS 4000 DPI LASER ENGINE, Powered by Philips 4000 dpi laser engine, precision and accuracy in control and adapts  to most surface., GOLD-PLATED USB CONNECT, Ensures reliable data transmission; avoid lag while game playing, BRAIDED CABLE, Braided cable finish provides high flexibility to avoid tangled wires, TEFLON FEET, Provide durable and smooth speed control, DPI INDICATOR, To Display DPI Status in 4 different Levels, 400/800/2000/4000, GRAPHICAL USER’S INTERFACE, Graphical user’s interface for personalized macro keys, advanced performance and light options., 64KB on board memory, 64KB on board memory for storing up to 18 Macro keys within 3 game profiles, plug and play while switching to different PC, Powerful 4000 DPI Laser engine, Powerful 4000 DPI Laser engine that can be used on most surfaces;On-the-Fly sensitivity multi-level resolutions:100 to 4000 DPI, Illumination, Illumination on Scroll wheel and Tt logo can be turned on / off separately]
